short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free online meetings with collaborative apps, no sign-up required

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collaborative applications are the next step in the evolution of virtual communication and will redefine the way we interact with each other. GatherAct is a marketplace for apps that can be integrated into online meetings.

- Completely Free To Use
- No Time Limits
- Works In Almost Any Web Browser
- Share audio, video, screens, and apps
